channel.title: Would you rather
channel.description:
Would you rather play a remake, or a server with custom content?
I'm thinking about making a 459 and want to know if it should have only RuneScapes content, or not.
I personally think non remake, considering all the remakes we have now. It'll be 459 data, gameframe, what not, with mostly 459 server side content, however I might throw in a few custom things whether they be quests, minigames, bosses, or other various ideas.

item.title: Would you rather
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I go with custom content.

Read full topic

item.title: Would you rather
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:452994”]combination of both.

Here is an example:

-who says you have to use a pickaxe to mine?[/quote]

Just gave me an idea!

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:453323”][quote author=Native^ link=topic=555850.msg4071235#msg4071235 date=1344370205]

combination of both.

Here is an example:

-who says you have to use a pickaxe to mine?

yeah i mean, nowadays they use dynamite
[/quote]xD! I guess it’s possible…

get the smoking gfx from the as a last resort quest, get the chinchompa gfx and bam you have yourself explosive mining?[/quote]

Do you know the graphic ids?

Read full topic

item.title: Would you rather
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

We could actually either use a 459 or make the graphics switchable from 498 and 602. Both have godwars though >.>

[quote=“Lin, post:6, topic:452994”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=555850.msg4070737#msg4070737 date=1344321707]
I used to love cache revisions around 474; however, when I started actually playing servers rather than developing them I realized how boring remakes were. I wouldn’t stretch your cache data too high, but I recommend having at least 500+ data so you can have Godwars.
[/quote]Godwars was in 474.

RuneScape remakes always seem exciting, but are typically boring because a lot of small stuff is skipped and slow leveling + few people = not fun. If you can create a decent remake with tons of exploring to do and get a bunch of players, go that way, because that will be more fun than a custom server.[/quote]

Most people like remakes because of nostalgia but it goes away after like 2 days of game play.

It’ll be just as much content and things to do as a remake, if not more. We plan to add tons of stuff from the 459 revision (if that’s the way we go) AND custom content.

Read full topic

item.title: Would you rather
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:5, topic:452994”]I used to love cache revisions around 474; however, when I started actually playing servers rather than developing them I realized how boring remakes were. I wouldn’t stretch your cache data too high, but I recommend having at least 500+ data so you can have Godwars.[/quote]Godwars was in 474.

RuneScape remakes always seem exciting, but are typically boring because a lot of small stuff is skipped and slow leveling + few people = not fun. If you can create a decent remake with tons of exploring to do and get a bunch of players, go that way, because that will be more fun than a custom server.

Read full topic
